Interface StaffService

All Known Implementing Classes:
StaffServiceImpl
public interface StaffService
Interface for Career Center Staff services.

  • Method Details

    • authorizeRepresentative

      void authorizeRepresentative(CareerCenterStaff staff, String representativeId, boolean approve)
      Authorize or reject a company representative.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff performing authorisation
      representativeId - the ID of the representative to authorize/reject
      approve - true to approve, false to reject

    • authorizeRepresentative

      default String authorizeRepresentative(CareerCenterStaff staff, CompanyRepresentative applicant, ApprovalDecisionRequest request)
      Authorize or reject a company representative.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff performing authorisation
      applicant - the company representative applying for authorisation
      request - DTO containing the approval decision and optional reason
      Returns:
      message indicating result of authorisation

    • approveOpportunity

      void approveOpportunity(CareerCenterStaff staff, String opportunityId, boolean approve)
      Approve or reject an internship opportunity.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff performing the approval
      opportunityId - the ID of the internship opportunity
      approve - true to approve, false to reject

    • approveWithdrawal

      void approveWithdrawal(CareerCenterStaff staff, String withdrawalId, boolean approve)
      Approve or reject a student's withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff processing the withdrawal
      withdrawalId - the ID of the withdrawal request
      approve - true to approve, false to reject

    • viewPendingRepresentatives

      List<CompanyRepresentative> viewPendingRepresentatives(CareerCenterStaff staff)
      View all pending company representatives awaiting authorization.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member requesting the list
      Returns:
      list of pending representatives

    • viewPendingWithdrawalsWithDetails

      List<WithdrawalDetailsDTO> viewPendingWithdrawalsWithDetails(CareerCenterStaff staff)
      View pending withdrawal requests with enriched details.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member requesting the list
      Returns:
      list of withdrawal details with student and internship information

    • revokeAuthorization

      default String revokeAuthorization(CareerCenterStaff staff, List<CompanyRepresentative> representatives, String repEmail, boolean confirm)
      Revoke authorization of an existing representative.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff performing authorisation
      representatives - the list of all company representatives
      repEmail - the email of the representative to revoke
      confirm - whether the revocation is confirmed
      Returns:
      message indicating outcome of revocation

    • approveInternship

      default String approveInternship(CareerCenterStaff staff, InternshipOpportunity internship, ApprovalDecisionRequest request)
      Approve or reject an internship opportunity.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff performing authorisation
      internship - the internship opportunity under review
      request - contains the approval decision and optional reason
      Returns:
      a message indicating the approval result

      staff - the staff processing the withdrawal
      withdrawal - the withdrawal request to approve or reject
